channel.title: notions on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in notions on Let's see what happens.

item.title: Democracy
item.description: As I understand today the notion is applied to anything where elections are not obviously bought/stolen/taken by force. And I have an impression that this word has really big halo among the demos. Or at least it is assumed to be this way. Obviously it is too subvertable to be anything that can be called “good”. But the recent war shows that in competition against more “archaic” system it wins (as it looks now).
